mapping.label: Reliability
mapping.description: the review is considered reliable, as opposed to reporting unreliable information.

mapping.label: Neutrality
mapping.description: the review is expressed in objective terms, as opposed to resulting subjective or biased.

mapping.label: Comprehensibility
mapping.description: the review is understandable/readable as opposed to difficult to understand.

mapping.label: Precision
mapping.description: the review is precise/specific, as opposed to vague.

mapping.label: Completeness
mapping.description: the review is complete as opposed to partial.

mapping.label: Informativeness
mapping.description: the review allows deriving useful information as opposed to well-known facts and/or tautologies.
